faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.heroSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about Model Guru.
faq.q1: How does Model Guru collect model data?
faq.a1: We collect data through publicly available APIs and information provided by platforms. We update our data regularly to ensure accuracy and timeliness. For more details, check our methodology page.
faq.q2: Does Model Guru provide API access?
faq.a2: Currently, we don't offer API access, but it's on our roadmap. Premium users get access to detailed reports which offer significant insights. If you're particularly interested in API access, please contact us.
faq.q3: How often is the data updated?
faq.a3: We update our data daily to ensure you have access to the most current information about AI models across all platforms.
faq.q4: Can I suggest a platform to be added?
faq.a4: Absolutely! We're always looking to expand our coverage. Please contact us with your suggestions.
faq.a5: Model Guru is a centralized platform for discovering, tracking, and analyzing AI/ML models across various providers like Hugging Face, Replicate, and more. We aim to simplify model discovery and provide insights for developers and businesses.
faq.q6: How is Model Guru different from platforms like Hugging Face or Replicate?
faq.a6: While platforms like Hugging Face host models and Replicate provides APIs to run them, Model Guru focuses on *discovery and analytics across* these platforms. We provide unified tracking, comparison tools, and trend reports that span the entire ecosystem.
faq.q7: How do I use the platform?
faq.a7: You can browse models, filter by platform or category, view detailed model pages with metrics, compare models, and explore our reports (premium feature). Sign up for an account to save favorites and receive personalized updates.
faq.q8: What are the benefits of a premium account?
faq.a8: Premium users get access to comprehensive daily, weekly, and monthly reports detailing model trends, usage patterns, and potential monetization opportunities. This includes unfiltered data and deeper analytics not available to free users.
faq.a9: We take data security seriously. User account information is protected using industry-standard practices. We do not store sensitive personal data beyond what's necessary for account management. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for more details.
faq.q10: How can I contribute or provide feedback?
faq.a10: We welcome feedback and suggestions! Please use the contact link in the footer to share your thoughts or report any issues.

team.title: Meet Our Team

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Model Guru's mission is to simplify the adoption of AI technology by providing a unified, transparent platform for AI model discovery. We believe that by removing barriers to discovering and evaluating AI models, we can accelerate innovation and enable more people to harness the power of AI.
